channel.title: Is anyone publishing gender disaggregated data to IATI?
channel.description: Is anyone publishing gender disaggregated data to IATI? Any links to samples or pointers to organisations doing this appreciated.

item.title: Is anyone publishing gender disaggregated data to IATI?
item.dc:creator: Wendy
item.description:
I understand that Data2x and MCC are co-hosting a workshop on introducing the community of practice in gender and development to the IATI Standard on Oct 12th so there might potentially be some interesting output? More details: http://data2x.org/event/data2x-mcc-co-host-making-gender-data-count-tracking-gender-aid-flows-iati/

Read full topic
item.source: Is anyone publishing gender disaggregated data to IATI?

item.title: Is anyone publishing gender disaggregated data to IATI?
item.dc:creator: JohnAdams
item.description:
Has anyone published any thoughts/guidance on how to structure IATI to report properly on gender?

item.title: Is anyone publishing gender disaggregated data to IATI?
item.dc:creator: bjwebb
item.description:
Looking at http://dashboard.iatistandard.org/elements.html it looks to be only unitedstates who are publishing the dimension element, and even then it looks to be only one activity http://datastore.iatistandard.org/api/1/access/activity.xml?iati-identifier=US-18-GE2-2750BXCOMD-TEP from this file https://iatiregistry.org/dataset/unitedstates-ge2

Looks like they are disaggregating by gender though.

Read full topic
